0.npcText: So, captain, what are the results of the weapon test?

replies.replyText: Our weapon failed to inflict any damage to alien ship
'Any' means 'any'. Not a single scratch after the explosion. Than ship is perfectly shielded against any physical threat.

2.npcText: Too bad. We didn't expect that bomb to destroy it, but to make no damage at all... Then evacuation is the only choice.

replies.replyText: Are we able to save everyone?

3.npcText:
I don't think so. It will be very good if we manage to save enough to establish at least a small colony that can survive on its own. 
 We will continue preparations, you are free for now.
